lyrics.l: I want you to stop right there baby
I might have been your fool for a while baby
But I know I'm a good loving man

Makes me mad as a man can be

Your kissing me was your plan
Hey, I know you were just faking me baby
'Cause you've been out with another man

Hey, I can't quit you baby
'Cause you're honey but the bees don't know
Yeah, there is one thing I got to tell you little girl
Just one thing before I go
That is you shouldn't lie to me baby
Makes me mad as a man can be
